body.name: Handheld Steam Cleaner,2500W Hand-Held High Pressure Portable Cleaning Machine with 3 Brush,Electric Steam Cleaner for Home Use, Kitchen, Furniture, Bathroom, Car Details (White)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 51 mins
features: 【High-pressure and temperature Handheld Steam Cleaner】 The rated power of our electric handheld steamer is 2500W, which can generate steams up to 120℃/248℉ hot-pressure steam in less than 15s, to deeply clean and eliminate grease, grime, dust and stains from a wide range of surfaces, which completely chemical-free, with no harmful fumes or residue.

【6 Speeds Adjustable】With 3 different brush heads, suitable for cleaning walls, cooktop, smoke lampblack, microwave oven, washing machine, refrigerator, and more, widely applied in kitchen, bathroom, furniture, car, etc.The compact size is convenient for storage. Up to 1-hour run time, helping you complete small cleaning tasks in your home. Even wash the dishes!

【Fast Speed-Degreasing is fast(15s-20s)】the temperature can reach about 100 °C. After the steam is sprayed, the spray head must be within 3 cm of the cleaning object , or it's not hot enough to clean obejects. If you'd like to clean heavy oil in kichen, it's better to use a bottle of detergent(firstly spraying steam into cleaning objects, then spray detergent, lastly spray steam again)

【1000mL Large Volume Water Tank】This steam cleaner for cleaning features an extra large water tank of 1000mL capacity(Supports adding water during working). Lightweight, Portable, and with a long power cord(4.9ft), this small steamer cleaner can go further and work distantly.

【Warning Tips】- When Used, Steam Vents Cannot Be Aimed At People, Animals And Electrical Products.When Replacing The Accessory, You Must Wait Until The Air Vent Is Completely Stopped And You Cannot Touch The Jet Switch.If There Is Foreign Matter In The Process Of Use, The Air Jet Is Not Smooth, The Nozzle Head Should Be Tightened, And The Hard Object (Usually Scale Solid) Should Be Taken Out.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #90,453 in Home & Kitchen (See Top 100 in Home & Kitchen) #22 in Handheld Steamers

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 2500W high power can generate 229°F/105°C high temperature and 3BAR pressure steam within 10s, effectively remove stubborn greasy dirt and stains. Warm Tips: There is No trigger on handbar, please turn off the power switch if want to stop steaming. It is a high-temperature steam cleaning machine, please do not touch the metal nozzle, do not touch the steam, do not spary at human, pets or the device itself. If the distance from the nozzle is farther, the temperature will be lower, so please put the nozzle close to the surface of the object to be cleaned, the cleaning will be more effective. If worried about accidentally touching the hot nozzle or steam, you can wear heat-resistant gloves, but gloves will make the cleaning process inconvenient, please use it carefully. When cleaning glass products, avoid bursting due to uneven heating. Recommended to be used by adults aged 25~60 who has the physical and mental ability to operate the machine normally.
1L/34OZ Large water tank Last for 1 hour without frequent refills. 2.2M Steam Tube & 2.5M Power Cord More freedom of movement and easy cleaning. Anti-corrosion interior Grease detergent can be added.

How to Use the Steam Cleaning Machine: 1.Add the water; 2.Plug the power; 3.Turn on the power switch, meantime hold the spray handle, the machine will start to spray steam about 10 seconds after the indicator light is on.(It is normal that water flows out before spraying steam.) 4.The spray nozzle is aimed at the surface of object, turn clockwise the regulator to increase the water vapor content, turn counterclockwise to decrease. 5.Turn off the power switch, unplug the power; 6.Drain the water in the tank and pipe, wipe off the water of machine with dry cloth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not for me
reviews.reviewText: No clear instructions, missing steam pipe. Sorry in a unusable state currently

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Lots of vapor... I wouldn't say steam!
reviews.reviewText: Has lots of (pressure) coming out the wand. I could almost put my hand close to the steam it wasn't as hot as I thought it would be. Large tank but no way to stop the steamer without shutting off the machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: The plastic components feel as they get to soft with steam running through them so it’s difficult to scrub the stove or bad areas with the metal bristles. But to disinfect or normal cleaning, I do like the tank that holds the water so not to much to transport while you move around cleaning. Light weight and easy to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for small areas and tight spaces
reviews.reviewText: Using this for cleaning those shower door pieces that just seem to grow gunk. This lets me blast the groves and crevices clean. Perfect for that deep cleaning chore that just seems to get put off.
